Title: WPF AutoComplete
Description: AutoCompleteTextBox is most advance MVVM supported control. It allows user to implement their own business logic to display auto suggesting like in AJAX.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

The most advanced auto complete TextBox in WPF.

Features List:

  • Supports MVVM for suggestions.
  • Supports Watermark.
  • Asynchronously load suggestions.
  • Load suggestions on-demand.
  • DataTemplate for suggestions.
  • Display Icon.

 

AutoCompleteTextBox supports suggestions in MVVM Design Pattern.

See the sample code on BlogSpot and CodeProject.
